description: This file defines a PatientProvider class in Dart, used in a Flutter application for managing patient-related state. It provides methods to fetch the current patient's profile and list patients from an API, and it notifies listeners about state changes.

classes.name: PatientProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages patient-related data, fetching profiles and patient lists from an API, and notifying UI components of state updates.

methods.name: fetchMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the current patient's profile and updates the state.

methods.name: listPatients
methods.description: Retrieves a list of patients with optional query parameters for filtering, pagination.
